name: autocoder-task
description: Azure DevOps pipeline task for AI-powered code generation

scripts.postbuild: cp task.json ./dist/ && cp -r node_modules ./dist/ && cp default-system-prompt.md ./dist/ && cp icon.png ./dist/
scripts.package:dev: cd .. && npx tfx-cli extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file ../config/dev.json --rev-version && cd - && npm run sync-version:dev
scripts.package:release: cd .. && npx tfx-cli extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file ../config/release.json --rev-version && cd - && npm run sync-version:release
scripts.publish:dev: cd .. && source ../.env && npx tfx-cli extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file ../config/dev.json --token $PAT
scripts.publish:release: cd .. && source ../.env && npx tfx-cli extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file ../config/release.json --token $PAT
